name: Japanika
description: Colorful Japanika offers a variety of sushi rolls, salads, and noodle dishes, including their popular Pad Thai Japanika. The history of Japanika started in 2004 winter in Tel Aviv, when a young couple...

name: Pitpit
description: Pitpit is a cozy restaurant located in Budapest, Hungary. They offer a variety of dishes with a focus on Mediterranean cuisine. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, making it a great spot for a date or a night out with friends.

name: Fat Mama
description: Fat Mama is a popular restaurant in Budapest, known for its delicious Italian cuisine and cozy atmosphere. The menu features a variety of pasta dishes, pizzas, and salads, as well as a selection of wines and cocktails. The restaurant is located on Kazinczy Street in the heart of the city.

name: Vapiano
description: Vapiano is a popular hang-out in Budapest, specialising in fresh pasta, pizza, and salads in a beautiful, laid back restaurant.

name: Twenty Six
description: Cool, plant-filled venue with a Mediterranean eatery, plus workshops & yoga classes.

name: Cafe Astoria Restaurant
description: Cafe Astoria Restaurant is an elegant venue with chandeliers and white tablecloths, offering Hungarian cuisine and champagne afternoon tea. It is located within the Astoria Hotel in Budapest.

name: Kinai Etterem Gyors Bufe
description: Kinai Etterem Gyors Bufe is a Chinese restaurant in Budapest that offers quick and affordable meals. The restaurant has received positive reviews for its tasty food and friendly service.

name: aran bakery
description: aran bakery is a well-designed bakery located in the popular 7th district of budapest. they offer a variety of cakes and baked goods.

name: la movida
description: la movida is a mexican bites and cocktails bar located in budapest, hungary. the chic and cozy space is decorated with colorful decor, bar seats, and plants overhead.

name: pointer pubs
description: pointer pubs is a pub and restaurant located in budapest, hungary. they offer a variety of food and drinks, and are open from noon until midnight on most days.

name: bamba marha burger bar
description: bamba marha burger bar is a popular burger joint in budapest, known for their fresh, locally sourced ingredients and unique burger combinations. they have received high ratings on tripadvisor and are ranked #99 out of 3893 restaurants in budapest.
